summary.description: Analysis of Ct values from high throughput quantitative real-time PCR (qPCR) assays across multiple conditions or replicates. The input data can be from spatially-defined formats such ABI TaqMan Low Density Arrays or OpenArray; LightCycler from Roche Applied Science, etc. It handles data loading, quality assessment, normalization, visualization and parametric or non-parametric testing for statistical significance in Ct values between features.
summary.name: HTqPCR
